Text: Your Uploads Are ALWAYS Top Notch.  Did You Put Hard Coded Subs In This Release?  I Heard Some Releases Are Missing Subs.
hello cgaurav007,any chance you could upload star trek,public enemies and year one,thanks very much.

Here's a complete subtitle that worke very well.
The one included only has subtitle when it's not English spoken dialogue.
http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3557348/district-9-en
Great quality. Subtitles are not hard coded. The subs included are only for non-English parts, however the timing is off. The subs in xgp_alex28's link are for everything, including English parts.

wow,what a great r-5.
thanks cgaurav007.

Excellent video quality. Very good audio quality.  Only negative is out-of-sync alien subtitles in the 2nd half.  A bit disorienting because the subtitle appears before the action.  For some reason that's harder to process than the sub coming a bit late (at least for me).  But it doesn't happen often enough to be a big deal.
Just FYI: I received a DMCA copyright infringement notice for this torrent. Somebody's watching. :)
